defaultpackagetypes.label: default package type
defaultpackagetypes.comment: please only change if you want to use carrier specific packagetypes as default

returnlabelcreating.label: creating return label
returnlabelcreating.comment: if this in use as default every shipment creates a return label, too

tracking_change_customer_notification.label: tracking status change customer email info(yes/no)

use_one_if_empty.label: Use diferent packages for different product
use_one_if_empty.comment: It's mean that packages will be created different for different products ducts
